text: The Hyundai Tucson is a compact SUV produced by Hyundai Motor Company. In some markets, it was previously sold as the ix35, but the ix35 name has been discontinued. The Tucson shares a platform with the Kia Sportage, as both are part of the Hyundai Motor Group. Tucson Category:Sport utility vehicles Category:2000s automobiles
title: Hyundai Tucson
